actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Tennessee Valley Authority from acquiring or utilizing, in carrying out is operations and functions, any coal mined by surface mining methods.

summary.text: Prohibits the Tennessee Valley Authority from acquiring or utilizing, in carrying out its operations and functions, any coal mined by surface coal mining methods. Defines surface coal mining for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Tennessee Valley Authority from acquiring or utilizing, in carrying out is operations and functions, any coal mined by surface mining methods.
